name: Anarkali Dress
description: A peach Anarkali suit is an elegant and versatile ethnic ensemble, known for its flattering, flowy silhouette in a soft, universally flattering peach hue. It typically features a long, flared kurta paired with coordinating bottoms and a dupatta, and can range from minimally designed for daytime wear to heavily embellished for festive occasions.

name: Boat Neck Crop Top
description: Brown boat neck crop tops typically feature a wide neckline that flatters the collarbones and a shortened hem that ends at the waist. They are available in various materials and styles, often designed for a sleek, modern look.

name: Coral Maxi
description: Coral solid woven maxi dress, has a round neck, short sleeves, concealed zip closure, an attached lining, flared hem

name: Ruffle
description: A ruffle dress is a garment adorned with strips of gathered or pleated fabric, known as frills, which create a textured, often voluminous, and decorative effect. This design element adds movement, femininity, and a playful charm to the dress.

name: Seashell Top
description: This Non Shrinkable, Non Fadable Round Neck T-Shirt Will Cater a Rich In-Class and Genuine Appearance in Any Kind of Ambience and Will Comfort You with Saving Time Iron-Free.This Casual T-Shirt Is Perfect for Everyone Like School-College Student, Working and Sports Person Etc.Washable: Hand-Wash and It Is Even Machine Washable, So You Just Need to Toss It in the Washing Machine and Relax.Homegrown Indian Brand

name: Coral Trousers
description: High-waisted coral trousers.Score high on the fashion meter by wearing this pair of coral trousers from Cation. Tailored to sartorial perfection from premium quality fabric, it assures a soft and soothing touch against the skin.

name: Soft Knit Cardigan
description: Material: Womens cardigan sweaters were made of cozy knit fabric, It will bring you a lightweight and soft feeling. This womens cardigan will be your favorite fall clothes in your wardrobeFeatures: Womens black cardigan, comfy knit duster cardigan. This Casual basic cardigan sweater desgin for a classic style, it can be easily combined, create variety of styles, and never go out of style. Long sleeve cardigan sweaters for women have many color to choose, suitable for all occasion, such as daily, home, office, work, busniess, school,party,etc Garment Care: Hand wash or mashine wash, hang dry and not bleach.

name: Sun Dress
description: A sundress is an informal, casual dress designed for warm weather, characterized by lightweight, breathable fabric, a loose fit, and minimal coverage of the arms, shoulders, and neck.

name: Pleat Midi
description: A maroon pleated midi dress is an elegant garment featuring a rich burgundy or wine red hue, characterized by an A-line or fit-and-flare silhouette that flows gracefully from a fitted waist to a hemline between the knee and ankle. The pleats provide beautiful movement and texture. .

name: Boho Top
description: A cream boho top is a free-spirited, nonconformist-style garment in an off-white or beige hue, typically characterized by a relaxed fit, natural fabrics, and decorative details like embroidery, lace, or fringe.

name: Crochet Vest
description: A cream beige crochet vest detailed with black, maroon, and brown accents is a stylish, often bohemian-inspired, sleeveless garment featuring intricate open-knit patterns and a rustic, multi-tonal design. The contrasting colors provide a rich, earthy look against the light base.

name: Evening Gown
description: Evening gowns in this color are considered timeless classics in formal wear and can come in various elegant silhouettes, including A-line, mermaid, sheath, or ball gown styles. The style can be chosen to flatter different body types.
